name: APOD - Astronomy Picture of the Day
description: Let your eyes gaze upon the glory of the Universe by visiting the daily interstellar capture.

name: Mars Weather
description: Have you ever let your noggin contemplate the climate on Mars? Heed no further, here is the 7-day on the red planet.

name: NASA Image Library
description: Think Space is large? Try searching NASA's Image Library. Historical shots from Armstrong to modern day.

name: Natural Event Tracker
description: Browse the globe daily and look for natural events as they occur.

name: Pale Blue Dot of Earth
description: The Pale Blue Dot is a photo of Earth taken by Voyager 1 on February 14, 1990.

name: EPIC Earth Imagery
description: View fresh photos of EARTH provided by DSCOVR's Earth Polychromatic Imaging Camera (EPIC) instrument.

name: Mars 2020 Perseverance
description: NASA's most ambitious MARS rover mission is landing on Feb. 18, 2021. View more about the mission and its most precise landing yet.
